ajaxbrowser.model module¶

class ajaxbrowser.model.Model(transitions=None)[source]¶

Build a model for these transitions and extend to all known cases

abstract(browser, examples)[source]¶

Attempt abstacting these examples and if successful return a list of similar entities else None

add(transition)[source]¶

Add transition to model

build()[source]¶

Build model of these transitions

dict_to_path(d)[source]¶
encode_data(items)[source]¶

Convert these querystring items into a string of data

find_diffs(kvs)[source]¶

Find keys with different values kvs: list of (key, value) pairs

gen_request(override_params=None, ignored=None, transition=None)[source]¶

Generate a request modifying the transitions for this model with the provided parameters

override_params: a list of ((key, value), method) pairs to override the parameters for this transition ignored: a list of (key, method) pairs of parameters that can be left out transition: a specific transition to use rather than the first one for this model

path_to_dict(path)[source]¶
ready()[source]¶

Whether this model is ready to be used

run(browser)[source]¶

Run the model if has successfully been built
